Uses of Class
org.daisy.pipeline.script.BoundXProcScript

  • Packages that use BoundXProcScript 
    Package Description
    org.daisy.pipeline.job
    Jobs are executable units which offer a richer context than executing a XProcPipeline by itself.
    org.daisy.pipeline.script
    Enhanced XprocPipelines with extra metadata to detail the input/output media-type, option directions, script authors and other details.

    • Uses of BoundXProcScript in org.daisy.pipeline.job

      Creates a job for the given script with bound inputs and outputs.
      JobManager.JobBuilder JobManager.newJob(BoundXProcScript boundScript)
      Creates a job builder for the given script with bound inputs and outputs.
